keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll

# Navigation - Scroll
map h scrollLeft
map k scrollUp
map j scrollDown
map l scrollRight
map zh scrollToLeft
map zl scrollToRight
map zk scrollFullPageUp
map zj scrollFullPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map d scrollPageDown
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom

# Navigation - Link 
map ; LinkHints.activateMode
map : LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <a-;> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map f LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForeground^"Tab
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue

# Navigation - Alacarte
map R reload hard
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot
map gi focusInput
map gp goPrevious
map gn goNext
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame

map gd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map go LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map gy LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

# Navigation - Insert mode (Disable Vimium temporarily)
map i enterInsertMode

# Navigation - Visual mode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

# Navigation - Pass next key
map \ passNextKey

# Navigation - Mark
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode

# Vomnibar
map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

# Finding
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

# History
map H goBack
map L goForward

# Manipulate Tabs
map T createTab
map J nextTab
map K previousTab
map gt nextTab
map gT previousTab
map ^ visitPreviousTab
map " visitPreviousTab
map g0 firstTab
map g$ lastTab
map yt duplicateTab
map <a-p> togglePinTab
map M toggleMuteTab
map x removeTab
map <c-X> closeTabsOnLeft
map <c-x> closeTabsOnRight
map X restoreTab
map <a-c-X> closeOtherTabs
map W moveTabToNewWindow
map <a-<> moveTabLeft
map <a->> moveTabRight

# Miscellaneous
map <c-[> escape
map ? showHelp
map gs toggleViewSource
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
gh: https://github.com/ Github
